title: PolitiFact - Donald Trump isn’t really this much taller than Michael Bloomberg
subtitle: President Donald Trump has aimed his insults at presidential candidate Mike Bloomberg, belittling the former New York Ci
author: www.politifact.com
vclaim:
President Donald Trump has aimed his insults at presidential candidate Mike Bloomberg, belittling the former New York City mayor with the moniker "Mini Mike."

"Mini Mike is a 5’4" mass of dead energy who does not want to be on the debate stage with these professional politicians," Trump tweeted on Feb. 13. "No boxes please."

The Associated Press has already looked into whether Bloomberg’s that short. (He’s not.)

But now we’re looking at a photo published on Twitter the same day as Trump’s tweet that appears to show the two men standing together. In the image, Bloomberg’s head doesn’t reach the president’s shoulder.

It was flagged as part of Facebook’s efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its News Feed. (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.)

That’s because while Trump is taller than Bloomberg, this photo has been altered to make him look about half a foot taller.

The original photo, taken at the New York Observer’s 25th anniversary in March 2013, shows Bloomberg between Trump and Jared Kusnher, the president’s son-in-law. In the real image, Bloomberg’s head clears Trump’s chin.
